jobDescription:
We are looking for a Java Developer to join our development team and help build, maintain, and improve scalable backend applications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Core Java, OOP principles, and backend development, with exposure to Spring Boot, databases, and RESTful APIs.

This role is suitable for fresh graduates who are eager to learn and work on real-world enterprise applications.

pros: Strong skill match: Java, Python, Communication, Leadership
DEMO MODE: Scanned PDF detected, using mock data
